question: who acts as the chairman of the election commission
vanilla_rag_result:
The chairman of the Election Commission varies depending on the country mentioned in the passages. Here are the details:

1. In India, the Chief Election Commissioner acts as the chairman of the Election Commission of India.
2. In the context of the ACT Electoral Commission, the part-time Chairperson is Mr. Roger Beale.
3. For the Election Commission of Pakistan, the Chief Election Commissioner serves as the authority and chair.

If you are looking for a specific country, please clarify!
